At least according to Amazon, a brand like VOVOLY that sells spatulas is as legitimate as a more well-known ...

t: Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).

t: Brand Unknown A Brand Register Seller
s: I am unable to list products with my registered brand. Amazon deletes my listings everytime I upload them. The system regards my brand as “Unknown”. They even inform me that I violate theis rules “Potential Trademark Logo Misuse”.
